'''Notices''' are the in game announcements of ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It allows players to view announcements about the game.

The Game tab contains Update Details, Summary of Known Issues and Post Patch Updates, links to [[Version]] Websites, Preview Pages, and [[Web Events]]. The Event tab contains announcements about different in game [[Events]] and [[Event Wishes]].

It can be accessed from the [[Paimon Menu]].

A limited number of announcements are available in the Notices Menu when accessed from the [[Login Menu]].
